operation.descriptionCdata:
6a61f9cb-1a7a-4d5b-845f-8bb8ab703884.description=This compares durations of two different pings. Used by the Ping Triangulation flow.

Inputs\:
threshold - How many milliseconds apart the two pings can be, and still be considered similar.

Responses\:
similar - The difference between ping times was less than threshold milliseconds.
different - The difference between ping times was significant.
failure - Unable to compare ping times.
operation.name: Compare durations

scriptlet.name: Operation Compare durations (c58a982e-f27b-43fa-a0d1-0b8942cd1a22)
